00007 void ClientInspector::NetworkError(SmppNwIf*) {
00008 
00009         AutoMutex a(terminateMtx);
00010         MT_LOGERROR("Network Error sndr and reciver terminated")
00011 
00012         if (sndr) {
00013                 delete sndr;
00014                 sndr = NULL;
00015         }
00016         if (rcvr) {
00017                 delete rcvr;
00018                 rcvr = NULL;
00019         }
00020 
00021         Deactivate();
00022 }

00024 ClientInspector::ClientInspector(XmlConfigPtr cfg, Processor* p) :
00025         Inspector(p) {
00026 
00027         MT_LOGINIT(ClientInspector);
00028 
00029         m_connectionType = cfg->get("connection_type");
00030         m_systemId = cfg->get("system_id");
00031 
00032         MT_LOG_SETPREFIX(m_systemId + ":" + m_connectionType)
00033 
00034         if (!m_connectionType.compare("TM")) {
00035                 type = bindTransmiter;
00036 
00037         } else if (!m_connectionType.compare("TV")) {
00038                 type = bindTranciever;
00039 
00040         } else if (!m_connectionType.compare("RV")) {
00041                 type = bindReciever;
00042         } else {
00043                 MT_LOGERROR("unknown client type ("<<m_connectionType <<"). set default type tranciever");
00044                 type = bindTranciever;
00045         }
00046 
00047         addr = cfg->get("host");
00048         std::string portStr = cfg->get("port");
00049         port = atoi(portStr.c_str());
00050         password = cfg->get("password");
00051         systype = cfg->get("system_type");
00052 
00053         XmlConfigPtr loadCfg = cfg->getConfig("load");
00054         if(loadCfg){
00055                 std::string maxLoad = loadCfg->get("max_rps");
00056                 if(maxLoad.length()){
00057                         m_maxRps = atoi(maxLoad.c_str());
00058                 }
00059         }
00060 
00061         if(!m_maxRps){
00062                 m_maxRps = 100;
00063         }
00064         recvBuf = new char[RECBBUFLEN];
00065 }
00066 
00067 void ClientInspector::runLoop() {
00068 
00069         TCPSocket *sock = NULL;
00070 
00071         bool lastBindResp = false;
00072         try {
00073 
00074                 if (!IsActive()) {
00075                         sock = new TCPSocket();
00076                         sock->Connect((char*) addr.c_str(), port);
00077 
00078                         if (lastBindResp) {
00079                                 SendUnbind(sock);
00080                                 RecvUnbindResp(sock);
00081                                 lastBindResp = false;
00082                                 throw std::exception();
00083                         }
00084 
00085                         SendBind(sock);
00086                         int status = RecvBindResp(sock);
00087                         if (status != 0) {
00088                                 if (status == 5) {
00089                                         lastBindResp = true;
00090                                 }
00091                                 throw std::exception();
00092                         }
00093 
00094                         MT_LOGDEBUG("create sender for client(system_id: "<<m_systemId<<")");
00095                         sndr = new Sender(proc->GetOutQ(), this);
00096                         sndr = sndr;
00097                         sndr->SendEnqLink(true);
00098                         sndr->SetSocket(sock);
00099                         sndr->setMaxRps(m_maxRps);
00100                         sndr->setSystemId(m_systemId);
00101                         sndr->setConnectionType(m_connectionType);
00102                         sndr->start();
00103 
00104                         MT_LOGDEBUG("create reciever for client(system_id: "<<m_systemId<<")");
00105                         rcvr = new Reciver(proc->GetInQ(), this);
00106                         rcvr = rcvr;
00107                         rcvr->setSystemId(m_systemId);
00108                         rcvr->SetSocket(sock);
00109                         rcvr->start();
00110 
00111                         Activate();
00112                         MT_LOGDEBUG("initialization passed successfully(system_id: "<<m_systemId<<")");
00113 
00114                 } else {
00115                         Data *data = new Data();
00116                         data->msg = new Message();
00117                         data->msg->type = ENQ_LINK;
00118                         Smpp::EnquireLink *enq = new Smpp::EnquireLink();
00119                         enq->sequence_number(proc->GetSeqNum());
00120                         data->hdr = enq;
00121                         proc->GetOutQ()->push(data);
00122 
00123                 }
00124         }
00125         catch (const std::exception &e) {
00126                 MT_LOGWARNING("can't init connection to to addr: "<<addr<<", port: "<< port);
00127                 if (sock != NULL) {
00128                         delete sock;
00129                         sock = NULL;
00130                 }
00131                 if (sndr != NULL) {
00132                         delete sndr;
00133                         sndr = NULL;
00134 
00135                 }
00136                 if (rcvr != NULL) {
00137                         delete rcvr;
00138                         rcvr = NULL;
00139                 }
00140 
00141                 //lastBindResp = true;
00142         };
00143         sleep(1);
00144 
00145 }
00146 
00147 }
